description: This dashboard displays traffic-light indicators to show the health of your Azure infrastructure resources based on key performance indicators and thresholds defined for each infrastructure resource type.

options.content: #### Welcome to the Azure Infrastructure Monitoring Dashboard!    Select a data source and subscription to see the current status of your infrastructure resources.  Examine the key performance indicators for your resources by expanding the row for a resource type.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let insight_table = InsightsMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/'
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms"
| where Namespace == "Processor" and Name == "UtilizationPercentage"
| extend Resource = toupper(tostring(split(_ResourceId,'/')[8]));
AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/'
| where MetricName in('Percentage CPU', 'Available Memory Bytes', 'VmAvailabilityMetric')
| union kind=outer insight_table
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'Percentage CPU'),
  kpi2 = percentile(Val, 95),
  kpi3 = avgif(Average/1000000000, MetricName == 'Available Memory Bytes'),
  kpi4 = avgif(Average*100, MetricName == 'VmAvailabilityMetric') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(kpi2), 0.0, kpi2) 
|extend kpi3 = iff(isnan(kpi3), 0.0, kpi3) 
|extend kpi4 = iff(isnan(kpi4), 0.0, kpi4) 
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1>80, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2>85, 1, 0)
|extend health3 = iff(kpi3<1, 1, 0)
|extend health4 = iff(kpi4<90, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2 + health3 + health4

let stroage_table = StorageBlobLogs 
    | where StatusText != 'Success'
    | extend ErrorCounter = 1
    | extend ResourceName = AccountName
    | extend _ResourceId = trim('/blobservices/default', _ResourceId)
    | extend _ResourceId = trim('/queueservices/default', _ResourceId)
    | extend _ResourceId = trim('/tableservices/default', _ResourceId)
    | extend _ResourceId = trim('/fileservices/default', _ResourceId)
    | project TimeGenerated, ResourceName, StatusText, ErrorCounter, _ResourceId;
AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.storage/'
| where MetricName in('SuccessE2ELatency', 'UsedCapacity', 'Availability')
| extend ResourceName = tostring(split(_ResourceId,'/')[8])
| extend _ResourceId = trim('/blobservices/default', _ResourceId)
| extend _ResourceId = trim('/queueservices/default', _ResourceId)
| extend _ResourceId = trim('/tableservices/default', _ResourceId)
| extend _ResourceId = trim('/fileservices/default', _ResourceId)
| project ResourceName, _ResourceId, MetricName, Average, Total
| union kind=outer stroage_table
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'SuccessE2ELatency'),
  kpi2 = sumif(ErrorCounter, isnotnull(ErrorCounter)),
  kpi3 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'UsedCapacity'),
  kpi4 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'Availability') by _ResourceId, ResourceName
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(toreal(kpi2)), 0.0, toreal(kpi2)) 
|extend kpi3 = iff(isnan(kpi3), 0.0, kpi3) 
|extend kpi4 = iff(isnan(kpi4), 0.0, kpi4) 
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1>5000, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2>500, 1, 0)
|extend health3 = iff(kpi3>4000000000000000, 1, 0)
|extend health4 = iff(kpi4<90, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2 + health3 + health4

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.network/loadbalancers/'
| where MetricName in('UsedSnatPorts', 'DipAvailability', 'VipAvailability')
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'UsedSnatPorts'),
  kpi2 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'DipAvailability'),
  kpi3 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'VipAvailability') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(kpi2), 0.0, kpi2) 
|extend kpi3 = iff(isnan(kpi3), 0.0, kpi3)  
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1>900, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2<=50, 1, 0)
|extend health3 = iff(kpi3<50, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2 + health3

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.network/applicationgateways/'
| where MetricName in('UnhealthyHostCount', 'FailedRequests', 'HealthyHostCount')
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'UnhealthyHostCount'),
  kpi2 = sumif(Total, MetricName == 'FailedRequests'),
  kpi3 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'HealthyHostCount') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(kpi2), 0.0, kpi2) 
|extend kpi3 = iff(isnan(kpi3), 0.0, kpi3)  
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1>=1, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2>10, 1, 0)
|extend health3 = iff(kpi3<=0, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2 + health3

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.network/publicipaddresses/'
| where MetricName in('VipAvailability', 'IfUnderDDoSAttack', 'PacketsInDDoS')
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'VipAvailability'),
  kpi2 = avgif(Maximum, MetricName == 'IfUnderDDoSAttack'),
  kpi3 = avgif(Total, MetricName == 'PacketsInDDoS') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(kpi2), 0.0, kpi2)
|extend kpi3 = iff(isnan(kpi3), 0.0, kpi3)
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1<100, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2>0, 1, 0)
|extend health3 = iff(kpi3>=1000, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2 + health3

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.network/virtualnetworks/'
| where MetricName in('IfUnderDDoSAttack', 'PacketsInDDoS', 'PacketsForwardedDDoS')
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Maximum, MetricName == 'IfUnderDDoSAttack'),
  kpi2 = avgif(Maximum, MetricName == 'PacketsInDDoS'),
  kpi3 = avgif(Maximum, MetricName == 'PacketsForwardedDDoS') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(kpi2), 0.0, kpi2) 
|extend kpi3 = iff(isnan(kpi3), 0.0, kpi3)
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1>0, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2>=1000, 1, 0)
|extend health3 = iff(kpi3>1, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2 + health3

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.network/expressroutecircuits/'
| where MetricName in('BgpAvailability', 'ArpAvailability', 'QosDropBitsInPerSecond', 'QosDropBitsOutPerSecond' )
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'BgpAvailability'),
  kpi2 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'ArpAvailability'),
  kpi3 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'QosDropBitsInPerSecond'),
  kpi4 = avgif(Total, MetricName == 'QosDropBitsOutPerSecond') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(kpi2), 0.0, kpi2) 
|extend kpi3 = iff(isnan(kpi3), 0.0, kpi3) 
|extend kpi4 = iff(isnan(kpi4), 0.0, kpi4)
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1<90, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi1<90, 1, 0)
|extend health3 = iff(kpi2>100, 1, 0)
|extend health4 = iff(kpi3>100, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2 + health3 + health4

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets/'
| where MetricName in('Percentage CPU', 'OS Disk IOPS Consumed Percentage','Available Memory Bytes', 'VmAvailabilityMetric')
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'Percentage CPU'),
  kpi2 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'OS Disk IOPS Consumed Percentage'),
  kpi3 = avgif(Average/1000000000, MetricName == 'Available Memory Bytes'),
  kpi4 = avgif(Average*100, MetricName == 'VmAvailabilityMetric') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(kpi2), 0.0, kpi2) 
|extend kpi3 = iff(isnan(kpi3), 0.0, kpi3) 
|extend kpi4 = iff(isnan(kpi4), 0.0, kpi4)
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1>80, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2>95, 1, 0)
|extend health3 = iff(kpi3<1, 1, 0)
|extend health4 = iff(kpi4<90, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2 + health3 + health4

let diagnostic_table = AzureDiagnostics 
    | where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.keyvault/vaults/'
    | where ResultSignature !='OK'
    | extend ErrorCounter = 1
    | project TimeGenerated, Resource, ErrorCounter, _ResourceId;
AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.keyvault/vaults/'
| where MetricName in('ServiceApiLatency', 'Availability')
| project Resource, _ResourceId, MetricName, Average, Total
| union kind=outer diagnostic_table
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'ServiceApiLatency'),
  kpi2 = sumif(ErrorCounter, isnotnull(ErrorCounter)),
  kpi3 = avgif(Average*100, MetricName == 'Availability') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(toreal(kpi2)), 0.0, toreal(kpi2)) 
|extend kpi3 = iff(isnan(kpi3), 0.0, kpi3) 
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1>1000, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2>500, 1, 0)
|extend health3 = iff(kpi3<90, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2 + health3

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.network/trafficmanagerprofiles/'
| where MetricName in('ProbeAgentCurrentEndpointStateByProfileResourceId', 'QpsByEndpoint')
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Maximum, MetricName == 'ProbeAgentCurrentEndpointStateByProfileResourceId'),
  kpi2 = avgif(Total, MetricName == 'QpsByEndpoint') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(kpi2), 0.0, kpi2) 
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1<=0, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2<=0, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.cdn/profiles/'
| where MetricName in('TotalLatency', 'ByteHitRatio', 'OriginHealthPercentage')
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'TotalLatency'),
  kpi2 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'ByteHitRatio'),
  kpi3 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'OriginHealthPercentage') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(kpi2), 0.0, kpi2) 
|extend kpi3 = iff(isnan(kpi3), 0.0, kpi3)
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1>100, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2<50, 1, 0)
|extend health3 = iff(kpi3<95, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2 + health3

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.network/azurefirewalls/'
| where MetricName in('FirewallHealth', 'SNATPortUtilization') 
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'FirewallHealth'),
  kpi2 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'SNATPortUtilization') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(kpi2), 0.0, kpi2)
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1<90, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2>80, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways/'
| where MetricName in('TunnelAverageBandwidth', 'AverageBandwidth', 'TunnelIngressBytes' )
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'TunnelAverageBandwidth'),
  kpi2 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'TunnelEgressBytes'),
  kpi3 = avgif(Total, MetricName == 'TunnelIngressBytes') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(kpi2), 0.0, kpi2) 
|extend kpi3 = iff(isnan(kpi3), 0.0, kpi3)
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1<1, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2<=1, 1, 0)
|extend health3 = iff(kpi3<=1, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2 + health3

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has '/microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways/'
| where MetricName in('ExpressRouteGatewayCpuUtilization', 'ExpressRouteGatewayBitsPerSecond', 'ExpressRouteGatewayPacketsPerSecond' )
| summarize
  kpi1 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'ExpressRouteGatewayCpuUtilization'),
  kpi2 = avgif(Average, MetricName == 'ExpressRouteGatewayBitsPerSecond'),
  kpi3 = avgif(Total, MetricName == 'ExpressRouteGatewayPacketsPerSecond') by _ResourceId, Resource
|extend kpi1 = iff(isnan(kpi1), 0.0, kpi1)
|extend kpi2 = iff(isnan(kpi2), 0.0, kpi2) 
|extend kpi3 = iff(isnan(kpi3), 0.0, kpi3)
|extend health1 = iff(kpi1>80, 1, 0)
|extend health2 = iff(kpi2<=1, 1, 0)
|extend health3 = iff(kpi3<=1, 1, 0)
|extend health = health1 + health2 + health3
